EmailTemplate.subject: Meet the Teacher (Early Years Foundation Stage)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
For Pre-Nursery, Nursery and Reception Parents: Please be reminded that you can meet your child's teacher on Thursday 28th August from 1-3pm.
Kind regards Sarah Townend British International School Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
_________________________________________________________ Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
